turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello I am wanting to order a coffee from my local Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which Starbucks location are you wanting me to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks at 2711 Calumet Avenue, Valparaiso, IN 46383

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of coffee drink would you like me to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am interested in a Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what size Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the biggest one they have a Venti I believe.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I will order you a Venti Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to add anything to this drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What are my options?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You can have whipped cream added if you'd like or a flavor shot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What flavor shots are available?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are many available, vanilla (available sugar-free) caramel (available sugar-free) cinnamon dolce (available sugar-free) hazelnut (available sugar-free) toffee nut. peppermint (available sugar-free seasonally) raspberry.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will take an extra shot of vanilla please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great ordering now. Confirming a Venti, Vanilla Bean Coconutmilk Latte with an extra Vanilla flavor shot.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink is on order at the Starbucks on Calumet in Valparaiso and will be available for pick up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Anything else I can order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good day!
